FuncDef: The reset aaa abnormal-offline-record command clears the statistics about unexpected offline records of all users.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To release memory resources and simplify information display, run the aaa abnormal-offline-record command. To facilitate the recording of unexpected offline records during a certain period, run the reset aaa abnormal-offline-record command to clear statistics about all user offline records.
Precautions
The records cannot be restored after being cleared. Exercise caution when running the reset aaa abnormal-offline-record command.
